## util smc for ton-preprocessed-wallet-v2

- `make all` – compile contract
- `make print` – print code boc and code hash
- `make clean` – clean build directory

## example flow

1. run `address_by_public_key` to get your wallet address
2. run `parse_storage` with data to get seqno (if wallet already active)
3. run `pack_msg_inner` then sign result with your private key
4. run `pack_extmsg_with_sign_parts` or `..._sign_slice` with sign, msg_inner
5. send external message with the cell received from the previous step
